content:
So I downloaded the argonaut profiles from here: http://www.fhir.org/guides/argonaut/r2/
But the StructureDefinition resources (eg on Patient) have a 'targetProfile' element in the ElementDefinition.type element, which is an R3 element...
that's my bug. I'll try and get to it this week

Just being picky, but in the conformance section for observation on this page: http://www.fhir.org/guides/argonaut/r2/Conformance-server.html the summary of search criteria uses example queries like: [base]/Observation?patient=[id]&category=laboratory . These should be [base]/Observation?subject=[id]&category=laboratory . (ie subject not patient)
sorry guys - brain-fart. My excuse is I'm getting over jet lag...
(I realized this when I was out for my walk and hoped to remove the question before anyone noticed, but you guys are just too quick!)
If you find any issue for Argonaut R2 you can log them here. We ( the Argo team) do intend to publish an update with technical corrections when we get a chance.
